pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, October 12, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually participate in the G20 Extraordinary Leaders’ Meeting on Afghanistan, convened by Prime Minister of Italy and President of the Council of Ministers Mario Draghi, in Italy’s capacity as President of the G20.

Closed to media.
